txt.en: A cold wind blows from the north-west of town.\n\nYou should search north-west in Byre Tor.
Instance: The Snows Come Again
Search the north-west of Byre Tor
'I hope you're ready to die.\n\n'The boys are right behind me, and behind them... well, you'll just have to hope that you survive long enough to meet him, eh?'
A cold wind blows from the north-west of town.\n\nYou should speak to the Uruk in the north-west of Byre Tor.
Jump off the cliff
A cold wind blows from the north-west of town.\n\nYou should speak to the Uruk in the north-west of Byre Tor.
Two more uruks stand in the road in north-west Byre Tor.
Uruks approach from behind!\n\nYou should defeat the attacking Uruks.
Run away from Núrzum!\n\nYou should approach the glowing path markers.
Núrzum is close behind!\n\nYou should run in the opposite direction.
Uruks approach from behind!\n\nYou should defeat the attacking Uruks.
Run east, away from Núrzum's forces!
Run north, to the edge of Byre Tor.
Two more Uruks appear to block the path...
Núrzum has arrived; run! Run the other way!
Talk to the Uruk standing in the road
Uruks approach...
Defeat the Uruk scout
Enemies are behind you!
Try to escape Byre Tor by heading north-west
Defeated attackers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat attackers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Jump off the cliff, quickly!
Run along the road, away from Núrzum
Run away from Núrzum, east!
You do not remember any more -- only staggering blindly away, far away from Byre Tor
Defeat attackers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Run east!
Run north
Jump off the edge of Byre Tor's cliff.
The snows and the enemies have come to Byre Tor once more.
Two more Uruks appear to block the path....
